mapper.select: SELECT platform_role_user.user_id, platform_role.role_id, platform_role.role_code, platform_role.role_name, platform_role.description, platform_role.enabled, platform_role.create_time, platform_role.update_time FROM platform_role_user LEFT JOIN platform_role ON platform_role_user.role_id = platform_role.role_id WHERE user_id = #{userId} and enabled = 1
